name: Vroom Vroom Beep Beep
description:
THE ULTIMATE VROOM VROOM SIMULATOR STUCK IN REVERSE

You need to get to the dealership before time runs out and the damage on your car is irreversable. 

WHERE DID IT GO?

The car dealership keeps relocating. You have to find its new location FAST.

RUN 'EM ALL OVER

People in your way? No problem! Just go straight over those pesky little inferior humans! Nobody can stop you!

COOLDOWN

Car on fire? Smash a fire hydrant to put it out!

CONTROLS KEYBOARD:

S: Reverse

A + D: Steer

SPACEBAR: Handbrake

R: Resets location to nearest road (USE IF STUCK)

MOUSE: Look Around

ESCAPE: Open main menu

CONTROLLER

A/CROSS: Handbrake

LEFT TRIGGER: Reverse

LEFT JOYSTICK: Steer

RIGHT JOYSTICK: Look Around

Y/TRIANGLE: Reset location to nearest road (USE IF STUCK)

MENU/OPTION: Open main menu
